name: Seasonal Harvest Box
description: Experience the best of each season with our carefully curated Seasonal Harvest Box. Each month, we handpick the freshest vegetables and fruits at their peak ripeness, sourced directly from local organic farms in Nuwara Eliya and Kandy. This box supports sustainable farming practices and reduces food miles, bringing you nature's bounty while protecting our environment. Perfect for families who want nutritious, farm-fresh produce without the hassle of grocery shopping.

items.description: Premium vine-ripened tomatoes from certified organic farms
Spinach, lettuce, and kale blend, pre-washed and ready to use
Rotating selection of mangoes, papayas, bananas, or pineapples
Carrots, beetroot, and radishes, perfect for curries and salads

name: Organic Greens Box
description: Elevate your health with our premium Organic Greens Box, delivered fresh every week. All items are certified organic, grown without synthetic pesticides or fertilizers, and harvested within 24 hours of delivery. This box is specially designed for health enthusiasts, fitness lovers, and families who want to incorporate more nutrient-dense greens into their diet. Support sustainable agriculture while nourishing your body with the purest greens available.

items.description: Tender leaves packed with iron and vitamins, perfect for smoothies
Nutrient-dense superfood, ideal for kale chips and healthy stir-fries
Aromatic basil, cilantro, and mint for flavoring and teas
Crunchy lettuce perfect for Caesar salads and wraps

name: Family Essentials Box
description: Say goodbye to weekly grocery runs with our comprehensive Family Essentials Box. Designed for busy families, this box contains all the fresh produce you need for a week of healthy, home-cooked meals. We've carefully selected vegetables, fruits, and kitchen staples that cater to Sri Lankan cooking styles while ensuring nutritional balance. Each item is quality-checked and delivered fresh to your doorstep, saving you time and supporting local farmers.

items.description: Beans, carrots, cabbage, bell peppers, and brinjal for everyday cooking
Bananas, apples, oranges, and grapes for healthy snacking
Spinach, gotukola, and mukunuwenna for traditional Sri Lankan dishes
1 kg red onions + 1 kg potatoes, essential for daily cooking
Fresh, ripe tomatoes for sauces, curries, and salads

name: Exotic Fruits Box
description: Indulge in the finest exotic fruits from around the world with our Exotic Fruits Box, delivered every two weeks. Each fruit is carefully selected for optimal ripeness, imported through sustainable channels, and quality-checked before delivery. Perfect for fruit enthusiasts, health-conscious individuals, and those who love to try unique, hard-to-find fruits. Treat yourself to international flavors while supporting fair-trade practices.

items.description: Vibrant tropical fruit from Thailand, rich in antioxidants
Creamy avocados from Kenya, perfect for healthy fats
Strawberries and blueberries, high in antioxidants
Tangy-sweet kiwis from New Zealand, vitamin C boost
Aromatic passion fruits for juices and desserts

name: Vegetarian Protein Box
description: Meet your protein needs with our specially curated Vegetarian Protein Box. Packed with plant-based protein sources, legumes, and nutrient-rich vegetables, this box is perfect for vegetarians, vegans, and anyone looking to reduce meat consumption. All items are sourced from sustainable farms that practice crop rotation and organic farming methods, ensuring both nutritional value and environmental responsibility.

items.description: Red lentils, green lentils, and chickpeas for protein-rich meals
Locally-made organic tofu, excellent protein source
Broccoli and spinach, high in plant-based protein
Complete protein grain, perfect for salads and bowls
Fresh green soybeans, great for snacking and stir-fries

name: Salad Lovers Box
description: Create restaurant-quality salads at home with our Salad Lovers Box. This box contains a variety of crisp vegetables, fresh greens, and salad essentials delivered weekly. Perfect for health-conscious individuals, weight watchers, and anyone who loves fresh, crunchy salads. All vegetables are grown using sustainable practices and delivered at peak freshness to ensure maximum crunch and flavor.

items.description: Lettuce, arugula, and mixed baby greens
Sweet, bite-sized tomatoes perfect for salads
Crisp, fresh cucumbers for hydration and crunch
Red, yellow, and green peppers for color and nutrition
Crunchy carrots for grating or slicing

name: Smoothie Essentials Box
description: Kickstart your mornings with our Smoothie Essentials Box, packed with fresh fruits, greens, and superfoods perfect for creating nutritious smoothies. This box is designed for fitness enthusiasts, busy professionals, and health-conscious families who want quick, healthy breakfast options. All fruits are picked at peak ripeness and delivered fresh to ensure maximum flavor and nutritional value.

items.description: Ripe bananas for creamy smoothies and natural sweetness
Mild-flavored greens for green smoothies
Strawberries and blueberries for antioxidant boost
Sweet papaya rich in digestive enzymes
Superfood seeds for added protein and omega-3s

name: Traditional Sri Lankan Box
description: Embrace authentic Sri Lankan cuisine with our Traditional Sri Lankan Box, featuring vegetables and greens commonly used in local cooking. This box supports local farmers who grow traditional varieties using age-old sustainable farming methods. Perfect for families who love cooking authentic Sri Lankan curries, mallum, and traditional dishes. Each item is carefully selected to bring the taste of home to your kitchen.

items.description: Traditional leafy green for mallum and sambol
Nutritious greens for traditional curries
Fresh drumsticks for curries and soups
Fresh chilies for authentic Sri Lankan heat
Aromatic leaves essential for Sri Lankan cooking
Fresh pumpkin for curries and traditional desserts

name: Baby & Toddler Box
description: Nourish your little ones with our Baby & Toddler Box, featuring soft, easy-to-digest fruits and vegetables perfect for babies and toddlers. All items are certified organic, pesticide-free, and carefully selected for their nutritional value and safety. This box supports your child's healthy development while giving you peace of mind about what they're eating. Ideal for making homemade baby food and introducing solid foods.

items.description: Soft, naturally sweet, perfect for purees
Creamy, nutrient-dense fruit for healthy fats
Soft, easy-to-digest fruit rich in potassium
Sweet carrots for steaming and pureeing
Mild, sweet apples for applesauce and snacks

name: Juice & Detox Box
description: Cleanse and rejuvenate with our Juice & Detox Box, packed with fruits and vegetables perfect for juicing and detox programs. This box contains high-water-content produce rich in vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants to support your body's natural detoxification process. All items are organic and delivered fresh to maximize nutritional benefits. Perfect for juice cleanses, detox diets, or simply adding more fresh juices to your routine.

items.description: Deep red beets for liver detox and blood purification
Hydrating celery for alkalizing juices
Tart apples for balancing sweet juices
Fresh ginger for digestive support and flavor
Fresh lemons for vitamin C and alkalizing properties
Hydrating cucumbers for refreshing juices

name: Stir-Fry Essentials Box
description: Create delicious stir-fries in minutes with our Stir-Fry Essentials Box. This box contains pre-cut vegetables and stir-fry staples that make weeknight cooking fast and easy. Perfect for busy professionals, students, and anyone who wants healthy, quick meals without compromising on nutrition. All vegetables are fresh, locally sourced, and ready to cook, saving you prep time while supporting sustainable farming.

items.description: Bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, and snap peas
Sliced mushrooms for umami flavor
Sweet, crunchy baby corn
Fresh scallions for flavor and garnish
Crunchy sprouts for texture and nutrition

name: Soup & Stew Box
description: Warm your soul with our Soup & Stew Box, featuring hearty vegetables perfect for making nutritious soups and stews. This box is ideal for cooler months, rainy days, or anyone who loves comforting, home-cooked meals. All vegetables are grown using sustainable practices and delivered fresh to ensure maximum flavor in your soups and stews. Support local farmers while nourishing your family with wholesome comfort food.

items.description: Carrots, celery, onions, and leeks
Sweet pumpkin for creamy soups
Starchy potatoes for hearty stews
Ripe tomatoes for tomato-based soups
Thyme, rosemary, and parsley for flavoring

name: Breakfast Boost Box
description: Start your day right with our Breakfast Boost Box, packed with fresh fruits and breakfast essentials. This box is perfect for families who prioritize a healthy breakfast and want convenient, nutritious options. All fruits are picked at peak ripeness and delivered fresh to ensure maximum flavor and nutrition. Support sustainable farming while giving your family the energy they need to start their day.

items.description: Bananas, apples, oranges, and grapes
Probiotic-rich yogurt for parfaits
Homemade granola with nuts and seeds
Strawberries for topping yogurt and cereal
Pure, local honey for natural sweetness

name: Grilling & BBQ Box
description: Fire up the grill with our Grilling & BBQ Box, featuring vegetables perfect for grilling and outdoor cooking. This box is ideal for weekend BBQs, family gatherings, and anyone who loves the smoky flavor of grilled vegetables. All items are fresh, locally sourced, and selected for their grilling potential. Support sustainable farming while enjoying delicious, healthy grilled meals with family and friends.

items.description: Colorful peppers perfect for grilling
Fresh zucchini for grilling and skewers
Sweet corn for grilling
Perfect for grilling on skewers
Sweet onions for caramelizing on the grill
Meaty mushrooms for grilling

name: Asian Cuisine Box
description: Explore Asian flavors with our Asian Cuisine Box, featuring vegetables and ingredients commonly used in Chinese, Thai, and Japanese cooking. This box is perfect for home cooks who love experimenting with Asian recipes and want authentic ingredients. All items are fresh, high-quality, and sourced sustainably. Bring the flavors of Asia to your kitchen while supporting responsible farming practices.

items.description: Fresh Chinese cabbage for stir-fries
Umami-rich mushrooms for Asian dishes
Crisp peas for stir-fries and noodles
Essential for Asian cooking and flavor
Perfect for kimchi and Asian slaws
Aromatic herb for Thai curries and stir-fries

name: Mediterranean Box
description: Embrace the healthy Mediterranean lifestyle with our Mediterranean Box, featuring fresh vegetables, herbs, and ingredients central to Mediterranean cuisine. This box supports the heart-healthy Mediterranean diet, known for its health benefits and delicious flavors. All items are fresh, high-quality, and sourced sustainably. Perfect for creating authentic Mediterranean dishes while supporting responsible farming.

items.description: Ripe tomatoes for salads and sauces
Crisp cucumbers for Greek salads
Colorful peppers for roasting
Oregano, basil, and thyme
Mixed olives for authentic flavor
Creamy feta for salads and dishes

name: Kids' Favorites Box
description: Make healthy eating fun with our Kids' Favorites Box, featuring colorful, kid-friendly fruits and vegetables that children actually enjoy. This box is designed to help parents introduce more fruits and veggies into their children's diet without the usual resistance. All items are organic, pesticide-free, and selected for their appeal to young taste buds. Support your child's health while making mealtime enjoyable.

items.description: Sweet, crunchy carrots perfect for snacking
Bite-sized tomatoes kids love
Sweet berries for snacking and desserts
Crunchy cucumbers for dipping
Sweet corn kids enjoy
Pre-cut watermelon for easy snacking

name: Senior Wellness Box
description: Support healthy aging with our Senior Wellness Box, featuring easy-to-digest, nutrient-dense fruits and vegetables perfect for seniors. This box is designed with the nutritional needs of older adults in mind, focusing on bone health, heart health, and digestive wellness. All items are soft, easy to prepare, and packed with essential vitamins and minerals. Show care for your elderly loved ones with fresh, healthy produce.

items.description: Easy to digest, rich in potassium for heart health
Digestive enzyme-rich fruit for gut health
Iron-rich greens for blood health
Soft, nutritious, easy to prepare
Healthy fats for brain and heart health
Natural digestive aid and bone health support

name: Fitness Fuel Box
description: Fuel your workouts with our Fitness Fuel Box, packed with high-protein, nutrient-dense foods perfect for active lifestyles. This box is designed for athletes, gym-goers, and fitness enthusiasts who need quality nutrition to support their training. All items are fresh, organic, and selected for their performance-enhancing properties. Support your fitness goals while supporting sustainable agriculture.

items.description: Complete protein grain for muscle recovery
Iron-rich greens for energy and endurance
Complex carbs for sustained energy
Quick energy and potassium for muscle function
High-protein yogurt for recovery
Healthy fats and protein for snacking

name: Zero-Waste Sustainability Box
description: Make a positive environmental impact with our Zero-Waste Sustainability Box, featuring 'ugly' produce, surplus vegetables, and items that would otherwise go to waste. This box is perfect for environmentally conscious consumers who want to reduce food waste while enjoying fresh, nutritious produce at a great value. All items are perfectly edible but may have cosmetic imperfections. Support the fight against food waste while saving money and eating healthy.

items.description: Perfectly fresh vegetables with cosmetic imperfections
Seasonal fruits that are perfectly ripe but surplus
Fresh greens from sustainable farms
Carrots, beets, and potatoes with minor blemishes
Perfectly ripe tomatoes in various sizes
Eco-friendly bags for future shopping
